title: Add task status types to UI
description:
Add TypeScript types for task status events and update sync handler.

Requirements:
- Add TaskStatusEvent type matching server schema
- Add taskStatuses state to board context (Map<tickId, TaskStatus>)
- Handle 'task-status' SSE events in sync handler
- Merge task status into tick display data

Files:
- internal/tickboard/ui/src/types/tick.ts - Add TaskStatus types
- internal/tickboard/ui/src/api/sync.ts - Handle task-status events
- internal/tickboard/ui/src/contexts/board-context.ts - Add taskStatuses state

Test:
- Verify TypeScript compiles
- Console.log task events when received
acceptance_criteria: UI receives and stores task status events
